EmailTemplate.name: 2021 Follow Up – EOM Group
EmailTemplate.subject: Deadline Approaching to Leverage your Five Star Award!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
We haven’t spoken in while, how are you doing? The last time we spoke you were interested in (package/tool) but you needed to speak with someone from your company first. Let’s all hop on a call to talk it over!
We’re coming up on our deadline and I wouldn’t want you to miss out on this opportunity to market your 2021 Five Star award! Please give me a call so that we can set up a time for us to speak.
I look forward to hearing from you!
Thank you,
{!Contact.OwnerFullName} Account Manager Five Star Professional {!Contact.OwnerPhone} {!Contact.OwnerEmail} www.fivestarprofessional.com
